description: This file defines a Flutter widget class 'BudgetScreen' that displays a simple UI with an app bar and placeholder text for budget analytics and charts.

classes.name: BudgetScreen
classes.description: A stateless widget that represents the budget screen UI with an app bar and placeholder content.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the BudgetScreen widget, returning a Scaffold with an AppBar and Centered Text.
